description: React component for admin user management interface, including role management, user list fetching, and guidance when backend API is not configured.

methods.name: loadUsers
methods.description: Fetches user list from backend API and updates component state.

methods.name: tryLoadOwnProfile
methods.description: Attempts to load current user's profile role from Supabase if configured.

methods.name: normalizeRole
methods.description: Normalizes user role from various possible fields to lowercase string.

methods.name: onChangeRole
methods.description: Handles role change for a user, updating via API and updating local state.

methods.name: Guidance
methods.description: React component rendering instructions for setting up backend API for role management.
